pkgmetadata.longdescription: ![Tests](https://github.com/strangeworks/strangeworks-qaoa/actions/workflows/cron_test.yml/badge.svg)# Strangeworks QAOA SDK ExtensionThis extension provides access to the Strangeworks QAOA service through the SDK.## InstallationInstall using `poetry````pip install poetrypoetry install```## TestsTest using pytest```poetry run pytest tests```## LintLint with black```poetry run black .```## Bump versionBump version with [poetry](https://python-poetry.org/docs/cli/#version).```poetry version [patch, minor, major]```## Update packagesUpdate <package> version```poetry update <package>```Update all packages```poetry update```
